extendedInfo.description: Financial Calculator is a simple, yet powerful and accurate intuitive calculator. Per request, now it is a free trial so that you can actually see it in action before buying. After some usage you need to purchase it.âââââ "best financial calc" - tester45234 âââââ "Fantastic app, just as good as a $60 calculator" - Cbh35711 âââââ "Easy mode is awesome! Support is excellent! and much easier than a BA II" - Grantioth âââââ "Love it!" - mccully2 Video tutorial: http://snipr.com/fcalc Features: * Time value of money. * Growing annuities. * Calculates N, Interest, Present Value, PMT and Future Value of Money. * Bond valuation. * Cash flow analysis in an intuitive interface. * Analyzes investments: Internal Rate of Return (IRR) and Net Present Value (NPV) * Amortization and Loans. Support for Canadian mortgages. * RPN support. * Near instantaneous calculations. -- Please, read the FAQ on the help section if you believe numbers are wrong. It's usually people missing something on the settings when using the financial calculator.Note about permissions: There seems to be some concern about the permissions. The reason they are there is to be able to email your results so it needs access to your phone, internet and email app. If you have further questions don't hesitate to contact us.

reviews.title: Not calculating correctly since last update
reviews.comment: I do follow the directions online regarding inputting info correctly, but am getting a miscalculation on my mortgage.  I compared results to those obtained using my actual TI BA II Plus and which matches my loan documents. This one is off by almost a dollar. Previously, this was the best financial calculator for android, even though I also ended up paying twice for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Have to purchase the app again!
reviews.comment: I am not liking this app before I paid them directly after the trial ended and now after getting another phone, cannot get the app again! So frustrated with them!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not recomended
reviews.comment: Nothing like the BA II plus
reviews.author: Nikky Prime

reviews.title: A must have.
reviews.comment: My ba ii plus is a constant target of my son. Having this tool on my phone awesome.
reviews.author: Bahiyyudin Ansari

reviews.comment: Perfect substitute for my HP 17bII
reviews.author: Christopher Boehm

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.comment: Imagine the money you are saving. This calculator does the same as a standalone device but at a fraction of the price. On top of this, the developer stands by the product. Performance has improved with the latest updates. Thanks Echoboom Apps!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: closest I could find
reviews.comment: to the layout of the TI BA II Plus.  Didn\'t want to have to learn a new way of data input with another calc.  This app works well, and the interface is adequate; just wish it wasn\'t a massive 6.5mb file when every other calc is <500kb. oh well. bought paid version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very slow load time. like takes forever. and when i quit the app, had to pull the battery once as the launcher froze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent calculator
reviews.comment: Its pretty similar to Ti Ba plus. Works well .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: how many time I have pay
reviews.comment: Hi...  Can u please clarify everytime if reinstall OS is it once again I have pay...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some trial period! LOL!
reviews.comment: Garbage. Each time I tried to back out of a menu it closed. Each time I tried to use help it only gave me a splash screen. Next time I opened it, I had one less trial. I barely got to try and in under 5 minutes I already have no tries left.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not an easy calculator, but one of the few REAL financial calculators on Android Market. Updated larger numbers helped.  Slow load.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paid for it at 0.99
reviews.comment: Bought it at 0.99 and now i am charged 2.99 hell no!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just like my BA ii plus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Trial
reviews.comment: Nice calculator, giving one star for not being clear about the 7-run trial beforehand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get a new phone
reviews.comment: Unlike the rest of the apps, if you get a new phone, or don\'t install this for a while after paying for it, you will have to buy again. Takes to long to load. Calculations work fine. Other financial calculators are more useful and free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I removed my earlier bad review, now the application opened on my device and worked fine unfortunate that I can\'t buy the paid version where I am now. maybe you should try having an ad supported version if the paid one didn\'t sell as expected.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best application for mortgage professional
reviews.comment: Great support!

reviews.comment: Says free but only allows 7 free uses
